ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They came rushing back to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So the people descended upon him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: whereupon people came to him running.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thereupon the people came running to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the disbelievers came running towards him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they came hastily towards him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they (people) advanced towards him, hastening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then came the others to him hastening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (his people) came toward him, hastening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: His people came rushing towards him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they advanced toward him, hastening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then came (the worshippers) with hurried steps, and faced (him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they (the worshippers of idols) came, towards him, hastening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Thereafter they (the people) came to him in haste.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they came running towards him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then the people came toward him, hastening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:94] So they came running towards him, walking hurriedly, and they said to him, ‘We worship them while you smash them?!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (his people) came towards him, hastening) from their festival.
